plot outline: Watch the full movie, Kalabham, only on Eros Now. Kalabham is a 2015 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Anil Kumar and produced by Hari Kumar. The film stars Bala, Manikuttan, Arun, Thilakan, Navya Nair and Baburaj in lead roles. The film had musical score by Raveendran.
title: Kalabham
plot: Watch the full movie, _Kalabham_ (qv), only on Eros Now. _Kalabham_ (qv) is a 2015 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Anil Kumar and produced by Hari Kumar. The film stars Bala, Manikuttan, Arun, Thilakan, Navya Nair and Baburaj in lead roles. The film had musical score by Raveendran.
